Hero.aboutMe: I am a web developer, based in Kraków, Poland.

About.heading: services
About.what-i-do-description: I focus on a web development and services related to it like design animations and much more.

faq.question: Web development
faq.answer: The process of creating websites and web applications. It includes designing user interfaces, front-end and back-end programming, as well as database management.

faq.question: Wordpress development
faq.answer: A specialization in developing and customizing websites using the WordPress content management system. It covers creating themes, plugins, and optimizing performance.

faq.question: Headless CMS
faq.answer: A modern approach to content management that separates the presentation layer (front-end) from the content management layer (back-end). It allows for easy integration with various front-end technologies.

faq.question: Coding figma layouts
faq.answer: The process of converting graphic designs made in Figma into HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code. It enables the precise reproduction of designed user interfaces into functioning websites.

Contact.question: Got a project? Need an unfair advantage?
